ptserver.data

Class CommunicationToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.data.Token
      • ptserver.data.CommunicationToken

  • public class CommunicationToken
extends Token
    Encapsulate tokens that were received within one iteration.

    Note: Kahn process networks are not being handled right now.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
        Return true if the object is equal to the instance, false otherwise. The method checks if the object has the same target name and the portChannelMap contains the same ports each having the same number of channels with the same tokens.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
